code: var CalculateavgRating=function CalculateavgRating(reviews){var totalRatintg=reviews===null||reviews===void 0?void 0:reviews.reduce(function(acc,item){return acc+item.rating;},0);var avgRating=totalRatintg===0?" ":totalRatintg===1?totalRatintg:(totalRatintg/(reviews===null||reviews===void 0?void 0:reviews.length)).toFixed(1);return{totalRatintg:totalRatintg,avgRating:avgRating};};export default CalculateavgRating;
